attributes.action: Stop giving young mothers housing think about single men who need housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a single male and i have been on the housing register for 7 years and last month i was thrown off the list saying there was no accomdation but when you walk about you see loads of empty propetys but they are for single mums who get pregnant so they can get benifets and a property and will never have to work , i pay my taxes i am a british citizen why not help me.. sorry i forgot i cant get pregnant
